articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Economic Shifts and Legal Battles Shape US Headlines
articles.description: The U.S. faces potential debt defaults, while Starbucks battles NLRB rulings. Chinese cyber threats target telecoms, and TikTok laws stir free-speech concerns. Trump navigates visa debates and potential TikTok bans, as U.S. homelessness rises sharply. Mega Millions jackpot winner emerges in California.
articles.content: The United States could be approaching another debt ceiling crisis, with Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen signaling that extraordinary measures may be needed by mid-January to prevent a default. Yellen urged Congress to take decisive action to maintai... [691 chars]

articles.title: Biden regrets leaving presidential race, thinks he would beat Trump
articles.description: President Biden privately regrets dropping out of this year’s presidential election and reportedly insists he could’ve beaten President-elect Trump if he wasn’t pushed out of the race by his own party.
articles.content:
President Biden privately regrets dropping out of this year’s presidential election and reportedly insists he could’ve beaten President-elect Trump if he wasn’t pushed out of the race by his own party.

articles.title: Trump says H-1B visa program is 'great' amid MAGA feud over tech workers
articles.description: Trump allies, including Elon Musk, vigorously defended the program to other MAGA adherents this week.
articles.content:
